inn1.comm: bowls a length ball on the middle stump, the batsman defends it off the front foot
length ball just outside off, the batsman comes forward and defends it towards cover
he comes forward and pushes it back down the pitch towards mid-off and calls for a quick single
short and wide, Ashraful doesn't waste any time, he cracks it over point
he gets one to jag back in from a short of length, the batsman dabs it towards second slip
this one leaves the batsman after pitching on a length and Ash goes fishing, is lucky not to edge that one
he bowls a full-toss outside off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it straight to cover
he bowls it on a fuller length from wide of the crease and it swings away, the batsman leaves it alone
bowls this one wide outside off and it swings further away, the keeper dives to gather it in front of first slip
bowls it on the stumps from wide of the crease, Tamim comes forward and just times it through midwicket
is that bat or pad first! Loud appeal for lbw, but that pitched outside off, hit the pad outside off, unnecessary appealing
he bowls it back of length around off stump, the batsman comes forward and tucks it to square leg
another length ball outside off, the batsman defends it to cover
this one jags back a long way from around off stump, hits the batsman on the thigh pad as he gets surprised by the movement
back of length delivery outside off, the batsman stays on the back foot and defends it back to the bowler
he shuffles across and tucks the length delivery towards wide mid-on for a single
back of length delivery around off, Tamim defends it towards cover off the front foot
more solid front foot defence by Tamim, he plays it towards cover
enough is enough Tamim says, from nowhere, he comes out charging down the pitch and smashes that over long on, absolutely kills that one, into the stands

oh that is all over for Ash! caught at gully! It was the first ball that Ash faced from Vitor, it bounced extra from a short of length and surprised the batsman, who awkwardly fended at that one. The ball caught the shoulder of the bat and lobbed gently towards the gully fielder

he is knocked him over with a corker! That is not what you want first ball as a batsman! It was full, swinging in to the batsman and the batsman was too slow to cover it, it takes the middle stump out of the ground.
a good delivery, full and swinging down the leg side, it catches the pads on its way to the keeper, excites everyone.. That was a really good ball though
another one swinging down the pads, the batsman flicks it to fine leg for a single
length delivery on the stumps from wide of the crease, the batsman dabs it towards mid on and calls for a quick single
another good delivery! pitches on middle, swings in to the batsman, Mush is lucky to get an inside edge on to it towards square leg
length delivery honing on to the off stump, the batsman comes right behind it in defence
fuller length delivery on the stumps, Mush stays in the crease and whips it through midwicket for a single
a loose drive to a full delivery outside off, the batsman gets beaten by the angle on that

what a drop at mid-on! Chigumbura it is! Oh no, that is one of the worst drops I have seen. Tamim tried to pull a shortish delivery, but was in no control, he got a top edge that went straight to the fielder
he bowls a fuller length on the stumps, the batsman tries to whip it to the leg side, but misses and gets hit on the pads, survives the appeal as it was heading down the leg side
another shout, this time for caught behind! But this is off the pad
he bowls a short of length delivery that jags back into the batsman and hits him on the thigh pad
fuller delivery on off stump, swings away and takes the outside edge past a diving second slip fielder
short of length delivery outside off, the batsman sways away from the line and lets it go
back of length delivery around off stump, Tamim stays in the crease and defends it
tries too hard, but bowls this one down the leg side
beautiful delivery! he bowls it from wide of the crease, it comes in with the angle and then leaves the batsman late, beats the batsman's forward prod
he bowls it full and swinging, wide outside off, the batsman lets it go through
fuller length delivery in the channel, the batsman comes forward and steers it to third man
length delivery around off stump, the batsman comes forward and defends it solidly to the off side
beautiful cover drive! It was full outside off and Tamim is not going to miss those ones, he drives it through wide mid off all along the ground
he comes forward and drives the length ball straight to cover
back of length delivery angling away, the batsman stays on the back foot and opens the face to run it down to third man
back of length delivery on the pads, the batsman tucks it to the right of square leg
bowls it wide outside off, keeps going away from the right hander, it's an easy call for wide for the umpire
better delivery, it's on a length just outside off, not much swing. Mush comes forward and defends it to off
back of length delivery on the pads, Mush allows the ball to come to him and runs it down to fine leg
another short of length delivery, the batsman gets up on his toes and nudges it to square leg
he bowls a good short delivery on the body, the batsman belatedly decides to get out of the way
he bowls a fuller length delivery that hits the batsman high on the front pad, loud appeal for lbw, but that was going over
he bowls a fuller length outside off and gets it to swing away, left alone by the batsman
he goes full outside off stump and Mush drives it to mid-on, with a lot of wrist in his punch
he goes aerial to a full delivery and whacks it over mid on, it just drops short of the boundary rope
he bowls it wide outside off, the batsman cuts it to deep backward point. Third man gets around to cover it, but almost allows it to go through him.. Poor poor fielding, lucky not to give a boundary
he comes forward and pushes it towards mid on for a single
length delivery on the stumps, the batsman comes forward and defends
he bowls a length delivery outside off, the batsman defends it towards cover point
he bowls it short of length and gets it to leave the right hander with the angle, the batsman lets it go through
another delivery outside off, going away with the angle, the batsman shoulders arms
he tries to bring this one back, but it goes down the leg side
back of length delivery, but this is on the pads, the batsman whips it off his hips to fine leg
he bowls a length delivery on the pads, the batsman comes forward and tickles it to square leg
length delivery on the pads, this time Tamim is able to nudge it to the right of square leg for a single
length delivery around off stump, the batsman stays in the crease to defend it, but inside edges it on to his boots
he bowls it with the angle and beats the batsman as he comes forward to defend
fuller delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it to deep cover

bowls it full and from wide of the crease, the batsman flicks it and takes off for a single, the fielder at midwicket dives and stops the ball, aims for the striker's end and misses, Mush would have been gone there..
he shuffles across the stumps and guides the length delivery outside off straight to gully, good stop by the fielder again
another full delivery from wide of the crease, the batsman punches it to long on for a single
he bowls it full on the middle stump, the batsman nudges it to backward square leg
he bowls a short of length delivery that is down the leg side, another wide for Vitori. He is almost bowling one every over
length delivery swinging in a touch around the leg stump, the batsman tickles it down to fine leg
a good slide at third man saves the boundary! The batsman had just opened the face of the bat to guide it fine
length delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and defends
short of length delivery outside off, the batsman sways away from the line of the ball and lets it go through
he bowls a fuller delivery on the off stump, Tamim tries to flick it to the leg side but gets a leading edge to off
length delivery on the pads, the batsman misses out as he is not able to get any bat on it
bowls it flat outside off, gets it to turn it a touch, the batsman goes back and punches it to deep cover
tosses it up, but this is down the leg side
he stays back and punches the flatter delivery down the ground to long off
slower and flighted outside off, the batsman again goes right back and pushes it towards deep cover
he stays in the crease and punches it to extra cover
the batsman comes forward to a flighted delivery and defends
on the pads and he stays on the back foot and works it away towards backward square leg
bowls short of length delivery that pitches on the leg stump and hits the batsman on the thigh pad as he misses a flick
good quick delivery on the middle stump, the batsman stays in the crease and arches back as he tries to steer it to the off side, gets surprised by the pace and plays it straight to point
angled away at pace, the batsman lets it go through
length delivery on the pads, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to the right of square leg for a single
he comes forward and defends the length delivery to cover
he bowls a fuller delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends it off the front foot
he comes forward and works the fuller delivery away towards midwicket for a single
he goes back to a low trajectory delivery and punches it to midwikcet
another tight delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
tries to cut it late on the off side, but hits it straight to backward point
this time he beats the man at backward point, takes a couple
chooses the slog sweep immediately as he sees the ball is tossed up, but there is a man at deep midwicket
he bowls a length delivery on off, the batsman gets squared up in his defence as he plays it towards off
he bowls a length delivery down the leg side and Mush takes full advantage, flicks it in the air but in the gap at deep backward square leg
he goes to cut a wide delivery but is beaten as the ball moves away
back of length delivery outside off, squares up the batsman in his defence
tests the batsman with a very wide delivery, but it's beyond the wide marker.. Another wide
angles it in from wide of the crease, the batsman defends it towards the off side
he is lucky that the top edge as gone over the keeper's head for a six, but that was an atrocious shot! Length delivery wide outside off and Mush tried to pull it to .. somewhere..Bad choice
full and flighted on the leg stump, the batsman nudges it to short fine
flatter and quicker on the stumps, the batsman defends it off the back foot
he tries to whip a full delivery to the leg side, but gets a leading edge to cover. They take a tight single, but an overthrow results in an extra run
tossed up delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it off the front foot
another loopy delivery, this time outside off, the batsman pushes it to cover
flatter delivery on the stumps, the batsman tickles it fine on the leg side for a quick single
the batsman charges down the pitch and the bowler responds it by bowling it wide, but it's too wide this time
he bowls a short of length quick delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends it awkwardly towards point
he waits on the back foot to this short of length delivery and punches it stylishly to deep extra cover
length delivery angling in from wide of crease, the batsman drops it towards mid on and calls for a quick single
length delivery around off stump, the batsman defends it solidly to the off side
length delivery outside off, the batsman pushes it to cover off the front foot
slightly short of length, the batsman punches it forcefully off the front foot, but straight to cover
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman pushes it back to the right of the bowler

caught at deep midwicket!  Super catch in the deep by Chatara, almost makes up for that earlier drop by Chigumbura! It was tossed up outside off and Mush went for a slog sweep, got a lot of bat on that and it looked like it was heading for the boundary, but the fielder came charging towards it, slid and took the catch low to his left
full and flighted delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to cover tentatively
another tossed up delivery, the batsman defends it off the front foot
he comes forward and pushes the length delivery to cover
more front foot defence by Tamim
he bowls a fuller delivery on the off side and the batsman drives it straight to cover
length delivery on the off stump line, the batsman comes forward and defends it to the off side
he pulls the length back a touch, the batsman defends it from the crease
back of length delivery around off stump, the batsman is a little late in his defence, he gets an inside edge that goes past the stumps
full and wide delivery, Shakib prods forward and punches it over the infield, to the extra cover boundary
short delivery on the body, the batsman swivels to pulls it down to fine leg
tossed up, slow in the air, draws the batsman forward, then turns past the outside edge
slightly short this time, allows the batsman to go back and punch it towards cover
he comes forward and defends the tossed up delivery solidly
this was a quicker one, the batsman tried to turn it to leg, but gets a leading edge back to the bowler
on the pads, the batsman flicks it straight to square leg
slower this time, the batsman comes forward and defends
length delivery on the stumps, the batsman waits in the crease and works it away towards square leg for a single

caught by the keeper! One-handed catch by Taylor diving low to his right ends Tamim's vigil. The batsman had charged out to play his favourite hoick over leg side, he got a bottom edge to that one and that was dying on to the keeper, who dives to his right to get his gloves under it just in the nick of time
he bowls it full on the off stump, the batsman pushes it towards mid off
length delivery outside off, the batsman waits on the back foot and punches it to the right of point fielder for a quick single
short of length delivery on the body, Shakib goes for a pull, but bottom edges it to his thigh pad
short of length again, but this is wide outside off and the batsman whacks it over point for a boundary
he allows the ball to turn and nudges it fine on the leg side for a couple
he waits on the back foot and nudges the length delivery to square leg for a single
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman pushes it past the left of point for a single
full delivery on the stumps, the batsman flicks it to short fine
shorter delivery around off stumps, the batsman opens the face, but plays it straight to backward point
tossed up delivery, turns into the batsman as he defends
he gets the ball to cut back in to Shakib, the batsman was looking to play a cut but gets surprised as it moves into him
he comes forward to a length delivery outside off and forcefully drives it, straight to extra cover
this one is on the pads and the batsman easily glides this fine on the leg side for a single
he bowls it full on the stumps, the batsman whips it past midwicket for a triple, but he has overstepped
he bowls length delivery outside off, the batsman wants what he gets but is not able to get hold of the shot, it drops way short of the fielder at wide long on
back of length delivery outside off, the batsman defends it towards point
draws the batsman forward with a fuller length, but it is wide outside off and beats the bat as it just moves a touch away
he bowls a length delivery on the middle and leg line, the batsman defends it awkwardly
another length delivery on the pads, the batsman drops it towards midwicket
he bowls it back of length on the stumps, the batsman works it away towards square leg
he bowls it full at a slower pace, the batsman drives it back to the bowler
fuller length delivery on the stumps, the batsman flicks it fine to the leg side
bowls length wide outside off, at his pace it was easy for the batsman to cut to deep backward point. The fielder hits the stumps from the deep and the batsmen take an extra run off the ricochet
he bowls a flatter delivery that turns away a touch, catches the shoulder of the bat and lobs towards cover.. Lucky that the fielder was too far
the batsman comes forward and drives it to long off for a single
flatter delivery, the batsman works it away to deep square leg with soft hands and the batsmen steal a couple
slower and tossed up outside off, the batsman dabs it towards midwicket for a single
full and on the stumps, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
tossed up and slower, the batsman comes forward and defends it down the pitch
he waits for the length delivery and punches it to deep cover
length delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it straight to cover
he waits on the back foot and pushes the length delivery towards point
tries to cut a length delivery, but it is not short enough and it beats the bat
gets this one to jag back from short of length, the batsman defends it awkwardly, his one hand comes off the handle
another tight delivery around off, the batsman defends it towards point

caught at backward square leg! It was a flighted delivery around off stump and Shakib goes for big slog sweep, gets a healthy top edge that settles into the big hands of Sibanda at backward square leg! Big big wicket this one.. Bangladesh in some trouble now
full delivery on the stumps, the batsman drives it back to the bowler
shorter in length around off stump, the batsman pushes it to cover off the back foot
he comes forward and drives the full delivery through cover
he goes on the back foot and nudges the slightly short delivery towards square leg for a quick single
quicker delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends it towards midwicket
length delivery, the batsman comes forward in defence
length delivery, around off stump, Nasir waits in the crease and pushes it back to the bowler
he bowls it slow, but full on the middle stump, the batsman digs it out
fuller delivery round about off stump, the batsman pushes it to long on for a single
bowls it slow and straight on the stumps, the batsman comes forward and defends
full delivery on the pads, the batsman goes for a forceful drive aiming for deep midwicket, but gets an inside edge to deep backward square leg
gets some turn and draws an outside edge towards backward point
full delivery, the batsman drives it to long off for a single
slower this time, the batsman comes forward and defends it to cover
tossed up delivery on the middle and leg line, the batsman drops it towards the leg side and steals a single
full delivery on the stumps, the batsman pushes it to long on for a single
he goes back to a back of length delivery, and pushes it to cover
he stays in the crease and punches the length delivery to deep extra cover
he comes forward and defends the length delivery back to the bowler
another length delivery outside off, more front foot defence by the batsman
slower and full outside off, the batsman drives it straight to extra cover
fired on to the pads, the batsman nudges it towards backward square leg for a single
he stays in the crease and punches the shorter length delivery through cover
tossed up delivery on the off stump line, the batsman drives it down to long off
loopy and full on off stump, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
flatter this time, the batsman punches it to long on off the back foot
he stays on the back foot and pushes the length delivery to deep cover
this one has been smacked to the deep midwicket boundary
short of length delivery outside off, the batsman cuts it to deep point for a single
slightly wide outside off, the batsman tries to cut it late but is beaten
fuller length delivery on the stumps, the batsman tickles it to short fine leg
he goes on the back foot and punches the length delivery to deep cover
back of length delivery around off stump, the batsman pushes it to point off the back foot
he nudges it to backward square leg for a quick single
waits for the ball to turn and turns it to the leg side, not a single though as the fielder from midwicket charges in
full toss down the leg side, the batsman sweeps it straight to fine leg
fuller delivery outside off, the batsman drives it straight to cover
waits on the back foot and punches the shorter length delivery straight to cover again
tossed up on the stumps, the batsman nudges it to short fine leg
he waits on the back foot and taps it past point for a single
tossed up delivery on the stumps, the batsman works it away to deep square leg
tossed up delivery on the stumps, the batsman flicks it to deep backward square leg
he moves away to make room and punches the short of length delivery firmly to deep cover
slow and flighted outside off, the batsman defends it off the front foot
he tries to paddle this delivery from the middle stump, but it hits the bat and lobs in front.. Too far from the keeper to get to through
he bowls it full outside off, the batsman drives it to deep cover, but the bowler has overstepped
he bowls a good yorker outside off, Mahmudullah fails to get a bat on that
length delivery outside off, the batsman drives it to cover off the front foot
he bowls it full outside off, the batsman digs it out to deep point for a single
loose shot by Nasir as he tries to cut a delivery that was too close and too full, it goes past the outside edge
he bowls a fuller length on the middle stump line, the batsman whips it to the big gap at deep midwicket for a couple
slightly back of length delivery outside off, the batsman punches it off the back foot to deep point
tossed up delivery on the off and middle, the batsman drives it to midwicket
he waits for the ball to turn and works it away to square leg
more of the same, the batsman tucks it to square leg for a single
and again, this time it is to the right of midwicket fielder
tossed up delivery, the batsman nudges it to short fine leg for a quick single
this is worked away to deep square leg with the turn
short of length delivery, the batsman is ready for the pull and he slaps it to deep midwicket, all along the ground
this time Mahmudullah tries to go for a pull off a not so short delivery, he gets cramped and gets a top edge towards the vacant square leg area
another short of length delivery outside off, the batsman tries to guide it through slip, but it bounces a touch extra and it goes past the edge
short of length, there is not room on that, but Nasir arches back and cuts it hard, good stop at point
angled in from wide of the crease, it is on short of length and surprises the batsman with the bounce. Nasir drops it to the leg side and calls for a quick one
this one is too quick and the batsman was no where near the ball as he tries to pull it
length delivery outside off, the batsman drives it on the up without moving his feet, but straight to cover
short of length outside off, the batsman punches this firmly off the back foot, to deep extra cover
the batsman stays in the crease and gets an inside edge to midwicket off a length delivery
he tries a slower delivery, but the batsman spotted it, he made room by moving outside leg and slapped it over mid off for a welcome boundary
he waits in the crease this time and chops the length delivery towards point for a quick run
he goes hard on this length delivery, but hits it straight to mid off
back of length delivery just outside off, the batsman stands tall and punches it to deep cover
short delivery and the batsman is a little late on his pull shot, he gets a top edge that sails over the keeper's head for a boundary
back of length delivery just outside off, the batsman arches back and guides it fine to third man
back of length delivery on off, the batsman dabs it towards point and calls for a quick single
short ball again, this time the batsman pulls it through wide mid on. The fielder chases it and pulls it in
he bowls a slower length delivery on the pads, the batsman gets an inside edge on to his pads, but the non-striker calls for a quick single
tossed up and full outside off, the batsman drives it to long off to bring up yet another fifty. Well played
tossed up and slow on the stumps, the batsman dabs it to midwicket
slight width outside off and the batsman cuts it through backward point for a boundary
on the stumps, the batsman dabs it towards backward square leg, but the fielder misfields allowing a single
fuller delivery on the middle, the batsman drives it hard, but straight to midwicket
full and flighted, the batsman pushes it to long on for a single
he brings out the big shot! It was slightly slower and full and the batsman muscles it to deep midwicket boundary with a powerful slog
full and flighted on the middle, he drives it hard again, past the midwicket fielder, but this is along the ground and deep square leg comes around to cut it off
super shot! He makes room by moving outside leg and launches a full delivery over extra cover with an inside out aerial drive
bowls it on the pads, the batsman pushes it to deep midwicket with soft hands
he waits on the back foot and chops the flatter delivery towards point for a quick single
on the pads from over the wicket, the batsman dabs it towards midwicket, but the bowler gets to the bowl quickly and prevents the single
length delivery outside off, the batsman chops it on the off side after staying on the back foot, takes a quick single
length delivery on off stump, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to point
he tries to make room, but the bowler follows him with a short of length delivery, the batsman manages to guide it to third man
he stands tall on his toes and cuts the short of length delivery down to third man

that is the end of Nasir Hossain's brilliant innings! It was an innocuous length delivery wide outside off, the batsman didn't move his feet and tried to whack it by flaying his bat, he gets a feather to the keeper
short of length delivery outside off, the batsman steers it to third man for a single
back of length delivery on the stumps, the batsman nudges it to short fine, but decides against the single. The throw comes in and hits the bat
slower delivery wide outside off, the batsman is beaten by the pace and he gets an outside edge past the keeper as he goes for a drive

that is a huge hit! or so it seemed, until it descended around deep midwicket where Masakadza gobbled it up at the edge of the boundary! It was a slower ball and Ziaur had picked it, he launched it high, but didn't get the distance
short of length delivery, the batsman whips it straight to midwicket
he waits in the crease and punches the angled delivery to midwicket
he bowls a slower delivery on the pads, the batsman clips it to square leg for a single to keep strike
full delivery just outside off, the batsman drives it to the vacant deep extra cover area to pick up a couple
he bowls a low full toss on the off and middle stump, the batsman this time flicks it in the gap at deep midwicket for yet another couple
short delivery, the batsman pulls it to deep midwicket for a single
he bowls a full delivery down the leg side, but this is a wide. It would have been a good delivery for a right hander
he bowls a good yorker this time, on the middle, the batsman digs it out and calls for a quick single
another one full and outside off, the batsman is not able to get any bat on that
he bowls another full delivery on the stumps, the batsman digs it out towards point this time
he bowls a low full toss on off, the batsman slaps it to long on without much timing
he bowls it full and wide outside off, the batsman can only dig it out to cover
be bowls a full toss on the middle and leg stump line, the batsman flicks it straight to backward square leg
goes for another yorker, but it ends up being a half-volley that Mahmudullah creams through extra cover
this one is on the blockhole around off stump, the batsman jabs at it towards cover and calls for a single
he bowls another yorker around off stump, the batsman blocks it out towards mid off and takes off for a quick run
he bowls a high full toss on the body, the batsman was surprised as he pushes it to long on. He looks towards the leg umpire, but it was just below waist high
he makes room and thumps the low full toss towards long on, just a single though

caught by the keeper! Razzak goes for a pull shot at a delivery that was wide outside off, he gets a big top edge that balloons high in front. The keeper calls for it and takes it easily. No Razzak magic today then..
he bowls it full and on the stumps, the batsman can only dig it out to cover
this one is slightly off the length, the batsman whips it to deep midwicket for a single
he bowls a low full toss on the stumps, the batsman punches it straight back to the bowler
he moves outside the leg stump, but the bowler bowls a slower delivery. The batsman then chops it to point and an overthrow allows a couple
he completely misses this slower delivery and is beaten. It was outside off and he tried to whip it to the leg side
this time it is full and on the pads and the batsman takes full toss by flicking it over short fine for a boundary
back of length slower delivery on the stumps, the batsman clips it to deep midwicket with soft hands to take another couple
goes for a yorker around off stump, the batsman digs it out to long off and brings up his half-century. Well played by Mahmudullah.
he tries to whack this slower delivery, but is completely beaten by the pace
this has been really really timed well! It was a low full toss and it followed the batsman as he made room, but the batsman just drives it over the bowler's head and it goes all the way
he moves outside leg stump again, the bowler follows him with a good yorker. Mahmudullah digs it out towards the off side and takes a single
it's a full delivery on off stump which the batsman creams to wide long off for a single
another low full toss and the batsman takes full toll! He has sent this into the trees at cow corner! Massive hit.. They have lost he ball this time
the bowler aims it at the base of the leg stumps, the batsman blocks it out towards cover
he moves way outside leg stumps and gets a good yorker on the middle stump, he is lucky to bring his bat down in time
full and angled from wide of the crease, the batsman drives it to wide long on and they come back for a risky second. The bowler is not able to collect the throw, would have been a wicket there
this time the batsman charges out, takes the length ball on half-volley and creams it through extra cover for a boundary
he is beaten by a slower ball and the batsman gets hit on the body as he has swung his bat too early
he bowls it full and in the blockhole, the batsman digs it out towards long on and they take a couple as the fielder is right at the edge of the boundary
another slower delivery, short of length, the batsman drags it towards deep midwicket for another couple

he takes the slower delivery on the full, whacks it straight to midiwicket and settles for the single. But Shafiul wanted the second and he runs halfway down the pitch, but he gives his wicket away as Mahmudullah hadn't moved

inn2.comm: starts off with a length delivery that straightens a touch, the batsman pulls out the bat out of the line
another length delivery, a touch wide outside off. The batsman lets it go through
good start this by the bowler. Another one in the channel outside off, Sibanda lets it go through
the batsman charges down the pitch straightaway but gets hit on the body as the ball moves into him a long way..
he bowls a fuller length wide outside off and it moves a touch away, the batsman comes forward and drives it towards deep backward point
that is a no-ball as Shafi strikes the stumps with his foot! Finned that is
angles it in from wide of the crease, the batsman pushes it towards midwicket for a single
tossed up delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it to mid off
some width on this one, the batsman goes back and punches but hits it straight to cover
he goes back again to a quicker delivery, it's pushed to short cover off the back foot
flatter delivery on the middle and off stump, the batsman defends it off the front foot
another forceful punch off the back foot, straight to short cover
this one is flatter, but it comes with some width and the batsman cuts it through backward point for the first boundary
good pacy delivery on off stump and it bounces a touch extra after pitching short of length, the batsman opens the face to steer it to third man
length delivery outside off, the batsman belatedly comes forward and pushes it to cover
he flashes at this wide and full delivery, but the ball straightens a touch and goes past the outside edge
he keeps it wide outside off and on a length, the batsman stays patient and lets it go
he brings this one in from wide of the crease and the batsman misses out on his flick, he got hit on his thigh pad
he bowls it on short of length from wide of the crease, the batsman pushes it to mid on and calls for a quick run

he comes down the pitch and plays down the wrong line, gets hit on the pads and that had hit him right in front! The only thing that saved him was that he was down the pitch.. fair shout by the bowler
flatter delivery outside off, but it's too short! The batsman waits and punches it through extra cover for three
tossed up delivery on the stumps, the batsman punches it to long off for a single
some turn for the bowler, the batsman defends it off the front foot
he takes a forward stride and defends that solidly towards cover
he tosses it up, but it is low full toss, the batsman punches it straight to mid on
he bowls it short of length from wide of crease and it surprises the batsman as it cuts into the batsman. He defended it but he had no idea where the ball was.. It went really close to the stumps
short and slightly wide, the batsman chops it hard towards point where Shakib gets a hand to it and it keeps the batsmen to a single
back of length delivery outside off, the batsman waits on the back foot and guides it to third man
back of length delivery around off stumps, the batsman stands tall and punches it back to the bowler
pitches it up this time and the batsman was ready, he thumps it over the mid off fielder for a boundary
he bowls a slower delivery that comes in a touch after pitching, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
he goes back to a length delivery and punches it to long off for a single
flatter delivery outside off, the batsman stays on the back foot and punches it to cover
tossed up delivery, it's full on off stump, the batsman drives it back to the bowler, who is not able to stop it cleanly
some turn there, the batsman punches it to extra cover off the back foot
slower this time, the batsman comes forward to defend it towards cover
slightly shorter, but it's on the stumps. The batsman went back and pushed it towards extra cover
he brings it back into the right hander, who gets hit on the thigh pad as he looks to clip it to on side
length delivery wide outside off, the batsman doesn't move his feet and tries to slash at that one, but he gets a thick outside edge past slip for a boundary..
back of length delivery from wide of the crease, the batsman punches it to extra cover off the back foot
angled into the right hander, he works it towards right of mid on for a quick single
he comes forward to a length delivery and then steers it to third man for a single
he tries to punch this length delivery through the line, but gets cramped for room as the ball jags back into him. He ends up pushing it back to the bowler
flatter delivery, defended off the back foot
he stays on the back foot and defends the length delivery on the stumps
he surprises the batsman with the bounce and turn and the batsman gets a thick outside edge. Mahmudullah at first slip gets a hand to it, but is not able to hold on. That counts as a drop
the batsman stays on the back foot and punches this flatter delivery to the off side
this time the length is too short and the batsman is quick to pounce on that, he whacks it over wide mid-on for a boundary
tossed up on off stump, it's just the right length too and it is in the batsman's arc of destruction. He sends this soaring over long on for a huge six
back of length delivery on off stump, the batsman punches it to extra cover off the back foot
he bowls it full outside off and the batsman goes for a cross-batted heave, he finds the gap at wide mid on for a boundary
this one was asking to be hit! Short and wide, that is slapped with a lot of power over cover... made a nice crunchy sound off the bat too
and again! This one is better controlled! It is short and not too wide, but the batsman threads the tiny gap between short cover point and point... Super shot
length delivery wide outside off, the batsman throws his bat at that without getting close to it.. Gets beaten
length delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and then lets it go through
starts off with a terrible delivery! It is down the leg side and Mush does well to dive full length to hold on to that

length delivery on the pads, the batsman misses it, gets hit on the pads and the non-striker calls for a single. Robiul also runs for it, gets there, turns and takes a wild aim at the non-striker's end with no  one backing up.. Useless that was..
length delivery outside off, the batsman punches it to cover off the back foot
this one is on the pads, the batsman misses the flick and gets hit on the pads. Loud appeal, but that was heading down the leg side..
back of length delivery just outside off, the batsman stands on his toes and punches it to extra cover
length delivery wide outside off, the batsman chases it and punches it towards point
length delivery outside off, moves away after pitching, the batsman lets it go
starts off with a back of length delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
shortish delivery on the middle stump, the batsman stays in the crease and wristily clips it to deep midwicket
length delivery down the leg side and Sibanda just lifts it, flicks it, whips it, clips it, with some power! It has gone all the way into the woods at deep backward square leg
length delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
fuller delivery on the stumps, the batsman drives it straight to midwicket
short of length delivery and the batsman is too early in his pull, he gets hit on his stomach..
length delivery outside off, the batsman stands tall and punches it to extra cover
he goes full with this one and the batsman latches on to it, he takes a forward step and thumps it over extra cover for a well timed boundary
the batsman stays on the back foot and defends the back of length delivery to the off side
short of length delivery on the pads, the batsman stays on the front foot and whips it to deep midwicket
short of length delivery wide outside off, the batsman chops it hard but straight to point
he comes forward to a length delivery, dabs it towards point and they take a quick single
the batsman goes on the back foot to flick the length delivery on the pads to deep square leg
another bad delivery, this one was on the pads and the batsman just helped it on its way to the fine leg boundary
length delivery outside off, the batsman punches it to mid off
length delivery around off stump, the batsman waits in the crease and pushes it down the pitch to mid on
another back of length delivery, the batsman punches it to long on for a single
fuller length delivery on off stump, the batsman comes solidly behind it and defends
pushed through outside off stump, the batsman comes forward and punches it to cover
slower and on a length outside off, pushed to cover again
he goes on the back foot and punches the length delivery to deep extra cover
he comes forward and dabs it to cover with soft hands, calls for a single
tossed up wide outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it to deep cover
full and flighted on off, it is driven back to the bowler

that is the first wicket for Bangladesh! It was short of length just outside off, and it straightens a touch. That was enough to trip the batsman in his attempted stand and deliver punch to the off side..
short of length delivery outside off, the batsman hops on to his toes and punches it to cover
back of length delivery on the pads, the batsman clips it off his hips to deep backward square and he comes back for a quick couple
oh that is stylish! It was a short of length delivery with lot of width! He smashes it through point, but very picturesque as he stands on his one leg while playing that
back of length on the stumps, the batsman gets right behind it and defends
length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it to cover
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman gets an inside edge towards the leg side
tossed up and full on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
full and flighted outside off, the batsman drives it towards short cover where the fielder gets a hand to it
full and flighted, but this is on the pads, and the batsman gets his front leg out of the way and drives it beautifully through midwicket
pushed through outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it to cover
full and flighted on off, the batsman comes down the pitch and drives it to long off
fuller delivery just outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it firmly to short cover
back of length delivery outside off, the batsman stands tall and punches it straight to point
length delivery on off stump, the batsman comes solidly behind that in defence
slightly wide outside off, the batsman rides the bounce and cuts it past point for a boundary
back of length delivery on off stump, the batsman chops it towards point off the back foot
length delivery on off stump, the batsman comes forward and defends
he goes back to a length delivery and cuts it straight to point
pushed through on off and middle stumps, the batsman defends it off the back foot
fuller this time, on the middle and leg stump. The batsman defends it off front foot
he waits on the back foot and punches the length delivery towards cover
quicker delivery outside off, the batsman punches it to cover off the back foot
that is the slider, the batsman punches it back to the bowler off the back foot
length delivery on off, the batsman defends it off the back foot towards cover
length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it off the back foot towards cover
he keeps it tight around the off stump, the batsman defends it solidly
length ball on the middle stump, the batsman goes on the back foot and punches it to midwicket
slightly short in length and the batsman pulls it past midwicket without much timing, a couple to deep midwicket
he tries to clip the back of length delivery from his hips, but he is not able to make any contact with that.. Gets hit on the thigh
he goes back to a flatter delivery and pushes it to point
interesting shot! It was the slider, slightly short and the batsman punches it straight down the ground.It looked like he wanted to go through midwicket
he comes forward and drives it firmly down to long off
slower and tossed up on the stumps, the batsman defends it off the front foot
quicker delivery, the batsman is quick to rock back and punch it to long off
full and flighted, the batsman comes forward and drives it to deep cover for an easy single
fuller delivery on off stump, the batsman drives it straight to mid on
short delivery outside off, the batsman is quick to pull that one in front of square, he's in the air when he plays that shot!
fuller length delivery on the off stump line, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler off the front foot
he tries to punch a length delivery through off, but the ball cuts back in and goes between the bat and the pad..
full delivery, bowled with a grunt, down the leg side..
fuller length delivery on the middle stump, the batsman pushes it to mid on and takes a quick single.. There is a direct hit, but he was safe there
short of length with a lot of width outside off, the batsman whacks it over cover with some power... There was a fielder at deep extra cover and he stood watching
he goes on the back foot and turns the flatter delivery towards midwicket
he goes back and defends the quicker delivery back down the pitch
he goes back and punches the length delivery down the ground to long off
the batsman punches it firmly towards short cover, where the fielder makes a half stop
fuller this time, the batsman defends it off the front foot
he goes back and punches it to long off for a single
length delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends off the front foot
on the pads, the batsman goes back and clips it to short fine for a quick single
flighted delivery, the batsman is quick to jump out from the crease and he drives it to wide long off
he pushes it down the leg side, brushes the thigh pad along the way
slow and tossed up outside off, the batsman waits and punches it to deep cover for a single
quicker delivery on the pads, the batsman is unable to get it away and gets hit on the pads
tossed up delivery, the batsman goes for a heave, but hits it straight to midwicket
drifts on to the pads, the batsman pushes it to the right of midwicket
full delivery on the stumps, the batsman drives it long off for a single
slower this time, and on the stumps, the batsman defends it off the front foot
shorter in length, allows the batsman to go back and slap it to long on for a single
fuller and quicker, the batsman punches it back to the bowler
he stays on the back foot and punches the length delivery to midwicket
he comes down the pitch and pushes the full delivery back to the bowler
he goes back and whips the length delivery to deep midwicket
he comes forward and pushes it towards cover
he goes back and punches the length delivery back to the bowler
he tries to punch it through off, but gets an inside edge towards the bowler
he bowls if full, the batsman comes down the pitch and almost yorks himself, then digs it out to point
he comes forward and drives it to deep cover for a single
lots of air in that one, the batsman drives it down the ground to long on
tossed up wide outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it to deep cover
quicker delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends it to midwicket
tossed up delivery outside off, the batsman tries to work it towards long on but gets a leading edge to the off side, Shouts of 'catch' as it goes past cover, through to long off
he comes forward and defends the full delivery back to the bowler
quicker delivery on the pads, defended to the leg side again
and more solid front foot defence down the pitch
fuller delivery wide outside off, the batsman tries to drive it, but gets an inside edge back down the pitch
slows it down a lot, the batsman waits and then defends
another full delivery outside off, the batsman pushes it firmly to cover
pushed through outside off, the batsman defends it off the back foot
short and on the middle stump, the batsman pulls it to deep backward square leg
pushed through outside off, the batsman defends it off the back foot
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman drives it back to the bowler
tossed up delivery on the stumps, the batsman goes down on his knee and slaps it over midwicket.. But there is a fielder in the deep. In certain T20 tournaments, that would have been a six
tossed up on off, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
length delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends it off the front foot
he dances down the pitch and punches the length delivery to mid-off, who is a little deep
he takes a couple of small steps down the pitch, but defends the length delivery to the leg side
back of length delivery outside off, the batsman gets up on his toes and defends
bowls length around off stump, the batsman defends it off the front foot towards cover
back of length delivery outside off, the batsman dabs it towards point and thinks about a single, but aborts the call
he tries to work away the tossed up delivery to the leg side, but gets a leading edge towards cover.. safe though
stays in the crease and works the length delivery to deep midwicket
flighted, but on the pads, the batsman nudges it towards square leg for a single
quicker delivery on the pads, the batsman goes back and nurdles it to square leg
tossed up, on the pads again, the batsman cannot get it away this time.. Defends to the leg side
he goes on the back foot and punches the length delivery to long on
he bowls it full and down the leg side.. just like Allan Donald used to bowl those wides..
length delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and defends it to cover

there comes the wicket! caught at cover point! Raza is gone now! He tries to punch the length ball in the gap, plays too early and hits it straight to the fielder.. With the pressure mounting in the last few overs, that was one thing Zimbabwe didn't need.
length delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and defends it off the front foot
he waits in the crease and works away the length delivery to deep backward square leg for single
another length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it towards cover

super shot that one! Gets the commentators going! Sibanda takes a step down the pitch, takes the ball on the full and drives it down the ground. Mid off had no chance as that was hit with some power. He brings up his half-century as well
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman shuffles across and tucks it to midwicket
he walks across to the off side and nudges it to square leg for a single
flatter delivery, the batsman waits and then punches it back to the bowler
he stays in the crease and punches the length delivery down the ground to long on
another wicket falls! Taylor chooses reverse sweep, but the ball catches the top edges and lobs up for the keeper! Bangladesh are tightening the screws now..
the batsman comes forward and drives the tossed up delivery towards cover
back of length delivery on the stumps, the batsman dabs it towards midwicket
he plays a premeditated pull, gets a short of length delivery too, he slaps it past a diving midwicket
length delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and defends it to the off side
he is playing too many shots now! Starts walking down the wicket to a widish length delivery, then gets beaten as he doesn't get close to the line of the ball
stands tall and punches it to wide mid off for a single
length delivery on the middle stump line, the batsman defends it towards cover
shortish length by the bowler, the batsman stays in the crease and punches it to long on for a single
tossed up, but this is on the pads, the batsman nudges it to short fine for a quick single
he goes on the back foot and punches it down the ground to long off
he goes on the back foot and cuts it past point for a single
he goes on the back foot and punches it down to long on for a single
tossed up delivery on off stump, the batsman turns it to midwicket by playing a close-faced punch
fuller length delivery, the batsman drives it powerfully, but straight to mid off
length delivery wide outside off, the batsman chases it but doesn't make any contact
loud appeal for lbw, but that had an inside edge on to the pads.. The batsmen sneak a single
he bowls fuller length outside off, the batsman drives it to deep extra cover for a single
fuller length delivery around off stump, the batsman drives it down the ground, past the non-striker for a single
he bowls a low full toss wide outside off, the batsman stretches out and punches it to deep cover
that is a super slap over midwicket! He just stood tall and played a short-arm jab over cow corner and that went a long way
length delivery on off, the batsman stays in the crease and defends
he bowls it full outside off, Williams punches it to long on for a single
he attempts  a yorker, but this one goes down the leg side
bowls a half-volley on the middle stump this time, the batsman drives it down to long on

length delivery on off, the batsman hits it towards cover and sets off for a single. The fielder is quicke and he flicks it towards non-striker's end, but it was the striker who had walked down too far
he stays on the back foot and works the length delivery to the leg side, towards deep backward square leg for a single
short of length delivery outside off, but Sibanda goes for the pull anyway, plays it along the ground towards deep midwicket
quicker delivery on the pads, the batsman stays back and clips it to deep square leg
he slows it down from round the wicket, it turns in and beats the bat as the batsman plays outside the line
fuller this time and Williams sweeps it hard straight to deep midwicket
quicker delivery on the pads, the batsman nudges it to square leg for a single
the batsman expected the ball to turn in, but that went straight on and beats the bat
this time, it's full and he goes down on his knee and sweeps it powerfully through the gap at deep midwicket for a boundary
goes for a yorker on the pads and it is a good one. The batsman gets hit on the boots, but that is too far down the leg side
fuller delivery outside off, a half-volley really and Sibanda bludgeons it over mid off
a good yorker on the leg stump line, the batsman takes it on the full and whips it to deep midwicket for a single
length delivery around off stump, the batsman defends it off the back foot
slightly short in length and the batsman is quick to pull it in front of square, the fielder at midwicket makes a half stop to keep the two to a single
short of length outside off and Sibanda powerfully pulls it through deep midwicket.. The fielder was not very far,but it was hit so firmly he had no chance to cover it
he comes down the pitch and punches the length delivery down the ground. The bowler gets a hand to it, but can't prevent a single
he goes back and whips it to deep midwicket with soft hands. They come back for a second as the fielder was a little slow
slow and tossed up on off, Sibanda defends it towards the leg side and since there is no one there, they take a single
he shows how to play the reverse sweep to his captain, gets a whole lot of bat on that and plays it in the air over point..
tossed up delivery, he sweeps it conventionally this time, to deep backward square leg
on the pads, it is easily tucked to long leg for a single
fuller delivery, the batsman punches it down to long on past the non striker
he bowls it full and on the pads, flicked to deep backward square leg with ease
he goes on the back foot and punches the length delivery back to the bowler
takes a forward stride and drives it firmly to cover
quicker delivery on the stumps, the batsman goes back and punches it to cover
stays on the back foot and chops the quicker delivery to point
quicker delivery on off stump, the batsman works it straight to midwicket
charges down the pitch and Shakib bowls a juicy full toss which is swatted through extra cover
slower delivery, the batsman goes down to play the sweep early and does it with one hand, down to deep backward square leg
on the pads, the batsman easily nudges it to square leg for a single
another tossed up delivery outside off, the batsman sweeps it to the same fielder at deep backward square leg
flatter delivery, the batsman goes back and punches it to long off for a single
length delivery outside off, the batsman punches it firmly to cover
fires it into the pads, the batsman flicks it to deep square leg for a single
tossed up on the middle stump and guess what Williams does, he sweeps it in front of square, in the air and that has gone over the ropes with ease
flighted and down the leg side, the batsman continues sweeping merrily, this time to the fine leg boundary
tossed up and it's a low full toss, another sweep, this time to the fielder at deep backward square
the batsman watches the ball carefully and defends it off the front foot
back of length delivery angling across, the batsman guides it down to third man
bowls a slower delivery that the batsman dabs towards cover point for an easy single
short of length delivery outside off, the batsman stays in the crease and whips it to midwicket
length delivery on off stump, the batsman pushes it past point for a single
he bowls a slower ball wide outside off, but Sibanda waits for it and plays  tennis forehand to long on..
he bowls a slower delivery, the batsman pushes it to extra cover, but the fielder misfields allowing a single
tossed up on the middle, he sweeps sweeps sweeps it to deep square leg for a single
bowls it slow and on the stumps, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
on the pads, the batsman nudges it to square leg for a single
dropped by midwicket! It was short and the batsman pulled it straight to midwicket, overhead chance goes abegging. Stick to sweep
he punches it straight to cover off the back foot
dropped by wide long on! It was full and the batsman just chipped it in the air, timed it too well and it went straight to the fielder running to his left, but Nasir drops it..
length delivery outside off, the batsman pushes it through cover for a single
he bowls a slower off cutter, the batsman dabs it towards long on with soft hands and they steal a couple
length delivery on off, this time he drops it right in front and takes a single easily again
here comes the short delivery, but the batsman carefully sways out of line
bows a full delivery outside off, the batsman drives it to long off for an easy single
he goes for a pull as soon as he sees it's short, but misses as the bowler got it to bounce extra and at pace
slow length delivery wide outside off, the batsman tries to punch it through off, but gets a thick edge fine on the off side
he goes on the back foot and punches the length delivery back to the bowler
flatter delivery on the pads, he works it to deep square leg for a single
slow, short and outside off, Williams rocks backs and whacks it hard through extra cover to bring his half-century! Super shot, super innings
this one turns in from outside off, the batsman waits on the back foot and works it to deep square leg for a single
full delivery outside off, the batsman drives it past the diving extra cover fielder to move to 99
this is full and the batsman gets an outside edge past the keeper! Sibanda smiles.. he is on 99 and not on strike
looks like that's going to be the case as he blocks this one towards midwicket and shows no intention of moving
he bowls a slower delivery that the batsman lets it go, the keeper is not able to take it cleanly as it bounces in front, and it goes all the way to third man
short delivery, the batsman lets it go through
short delivery again, the batsman sways out of line
another short delivery! The batsman ducks under it, but this one was quite high, everyone looks towards the leg umpire.. He is not signalled anything.. Smiles all around

he edges the length delivery through the vacant slip to get to his century and help Zimbabwe take the series! Fist pumps all around, lots of noise in the crowd as the numbers have swelled during the day
